preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(1) > 0 FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM role_permission rp INNER JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE p.name IN ('GERMPLASM', 'MANAGE_GERMPLASM') GROUP BY rp.role_id ) AS count;

changeSet.comment: Removing Merge germplasm permission for roles that do not have Full permissions.
